verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

קַדֶּשׁ־ <WH6942> Sanctify לִ֨י כָל־ <WH3605> every בְּכ֜וֹר <WH1060> unto me all the firstborn פֶּ֤טֶר <WH6363> whatsoever openeth כָּל־ <WH3605> of every רֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH7358> the womb בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> [both] of man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and of beast לִ֖י הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto the people זָכ֞וֹר <WH2142> Remember אֶת־ <WH853> הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יְצָאתֶ֤ם <WH3318> in which ye came out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> from Egypt מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> of bondage כִּ֚י <WH3588> by בְּחֹ֣זֶק <WH2392> for by strength יָ֔ד <WH3027> of hand הוֹצִ֧יא <WH3318> brought you out יְהֹוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and nothing יֵאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> be eaten חָמֵֽץ׃ <WH2557> from this [place] there shall no leavened bread
הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> This day אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you יֹצְאִ֑ים <WH3318> came ye out בְּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> in the month הָאָבִֽיב׃ <WH24> Abib

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become כִֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when יְבִֽיאֲךָ֣ <WH935> shall bring יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land הַֽ֠כְּנַעֲנִי <WH3669> of the Canaanites וְהַחִתִּ֨י <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַחִוִּ֣י <WH2340> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֗י <WH2983> and the Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> unto thy fathers לָ֣תֶת <WH5414> to give לָ֔ךְ אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> thee a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> and honey וְעָבַדְתָּ֛ <WH5647> that thou shalt keep אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> this service הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> in this month הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> Seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> thou shalt eat מַצֹּ֑ת <WH4682> unleavened bread וּבַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and in the seventh חַ֖ג <WH2282> [shall be] a feast לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> to the LORD

מַצּוֹת֙ <WH4682> Unleavened bread יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> shall be eaten אֵ֖ת <WH853> שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and nothing יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> be seen לְךָ֜ חָמֵ֗ץ <WH2557> and there shall no leavened bread וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יֵרָאֶ֥ה <WH7200> seen לְךָ֛ שְׂאֹ֖ר <WH7603> with thee neither shall there be leaven בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1366> with thee in all thy quarters

וְהִגַּדְתָּ֣ <WH5046> And thou shalt shew לְבִנְךָ֔ <WH1121> thy son בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בַּעֲב֣וּר <WH5668> [This is done] because of זֶ֗ה <WH2088> that עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> did יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [which] the LORD לִ֔י בְּצֵאתִ֖י <WH3318> unto me when I came forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> shall serve לְךָ֨ לְא֜וֹת <WH226> And it shall be for a sign עַל־ <WH5921> unto יָדְךָ֗ <WH3027> unto thee upon thine hand וּלְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> and for a memorial בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among עֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> between thine eyes לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> and it תִּהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> shall serve תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> law יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD'S בְּפִ֑יךָ <WH6310> may be in thy mouth כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> for with a strong הוֹצִֽאֲךָ֥ <WH3318> brought thee out יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> hath the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֛ <WH8104> Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֻקָּ֥ה <WH2708> this ordinance הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> its לְמוֹעֲדָ֑הּ <WH4150> in his season מִיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> from year יָמִֽימָה׃ <WH3117> to year ס

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now when יְבִֽאֲךָ֤ <WH935> shall bring יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And it shall be when the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> of the Canaanites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> he נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> as he sware לְךָ֖ וְלַֽאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> unto thee and to thy fathers וּנְתָנָ֖הּ <WH5414> and shall give לָֽךְ׃

וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <WH5674> That thou shalt set apart כָל־ <WH3605> of every פֶּֽטֶר־ <WH6363> all that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <WH7358> the matrix לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> of every פֶּ֣טֶר ׀ <WH6363> and every firstling שֶׁ֣גֶר <WH7698> that cometh בְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> of a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> own לְךָ֛ הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <WH2145> which thou hast the males לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [shall be] the LORD'S

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every פֶּ֤טֶר <WH6363> And every firstling חֲמֹר֙ <WH2543> of an ass תִּפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> thou shalt redeem בְשֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> with a lamb וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִפְדֶּ֖ה <WH6299> and if thou wilt not redeem וַעֲרַפְתּ֑וֹ <WH6202> it then thou shalt break his neck וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> and every בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> and all the firstborn אָדָ֛ם <WH120> of man בְּבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> among thy children תִּפְדֶּֽה׃ <WH6299> shalt thou redeem

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <WH7592> asketh בִנְךָ֛ <WH1121> And it shall be when thy son מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> What [is] this? that thou shalt say אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him בְּחֹ֣זֶק <WH2392> unto him By strength יָ֗ד <WH3027> of hand הוֹצִיאָ֧נוּ <WH3318> brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> from Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <WH5650> of bondage

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when הִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH7185> would hardly פַרְעֹה֮ <WH6547> And it came to pass when Pharaoh לְשַׁלְּחֵנוּ֒ <WH7971> let us go וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <WH2026> slew יְהֹוָ֤ה <WH3068> that the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> every בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבְּכֹ֥ר <WH1060> both the firstborn אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> and the firstborn בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> of beast עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֩ <WH3651> after that אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I זֹבֵ֜חַ <WH2076> therefore I sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> to the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> of every פֶּ֤טֶר <WH6363> all that openeth רֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH7358> the matrix הַזְּכָרִ֔ים <WH2145> being males וְכָל־ <WH3605> every בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> but all the firstborn בָּנַ֖י <WH1121> of my children אֶפְדֶּֽה׃ <WH6299> I redeem

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> shall serve לְאוֹת֙ <WH226> And it shall be for a token עַל־ <WH5921> on יָ֣דְכָ֔ה <WH3027> upon thine hand וּלְטוֹטָפֹ֖ת <WH2903> and for frontlets בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> between thine eyes כִּ֚י <WH3588> with בְּחֹ֣זֶק <WH2392> for by strength יָ֔ד <WH3027> of hand הוֹצִיאָ֥נוּ <WH3318> brought us forth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt ס

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become בְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> go פַּרְעֹה֮ <WH6547> And it came to pass when Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֒ <WH5971> had let the people וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not נָחָ֣ם <WH5148> led אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> that God דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> them not [through] the way אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines כִּ֥י <WH3588> although קָר֖וֹב <WH7138> that [was] near ה֑וּא <WH1931> he כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> though אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> for God פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> might יִנָּחֵ֥ם <WH5162> repent הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> Lest peradventure the people בִּרְאֹתָ֥ם <WH7200> when they see מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> war וְשָׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> and they return מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> to Egypt

וַיַּסֵּ֨ב <WH5437> about אֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> But God אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> [through] the way הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> of the wilderness יַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֑וּף <WH5488> of the Red וַחֲמֻשִׁ֛ים <WH2571> harnessed עָל֥וּ <WH5927> went up בְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> the bones יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with כִּי֩ <WH3588> for הַשְׁבֵּ֨עַ <WH7650> with him for he had straitly הִשְׁבִּ֜יעַ <WH7650> sworn אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying פָּקֹ֨ד <WH6485> will surely יִפְקֹ֤ד <WH6485> visit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְהַעֲלִיתֶ֧ם <WH5927> away אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמֹתַ֛י <WH6106> my bones מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> here אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> And they took their journey מִסֻּכֹּ֑ת <WH5523> from Succoth וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> and encamped בְאֵתָ֔ם <WH864> in Etham בִּקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> in the edge הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness

וַֽיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> And the LORD הֹלֵךְ֩ <WH1980> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֨ם <WH6440> before יוֹמָ֜ם <WH3119> them by day בְּעַמּ֤וּד <WH5982> in a pillar עָנָן֙ <WH6051> of a cloud לַנְחֹתָ֣ם <WH5148> to lead הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> them the way וְלַ֛יְלָה <WH3915> and by night בְּעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> in a pillar אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire לְהָאִ֣יר <WH215> to give them light לָהֶ֑ם לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> travel יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> by day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> and night

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָמִ֞ישׁ <WH4185> He took not away עַמּ֤וּד <WH5982> the pillar הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> of the cloud יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> by day וְעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> nor the pillar הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> [from] before הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people פ
